titles.title: A bill for the relief of Elizabeth Palansky Surak.

bill.summary: 3/17/1987--Introduced. Directs that, notwithstanding specified time limitations, the Foreign Claims Settlement Commission of the United States receive and determine a named individual's claims against Czechoslovakia arising from the nationalization or other taking, over a specified period, of her property or that of her spouse.
